name: MOONSLINGER
description:
Now separated from the Jam version, MOONSLINGER is receiving updates! 

(by the way umm some buttons turned invisible... if you click around the center of the screen on the game over screen though, it should still work)

HOW TO PLAY - 
  • use arrow keys or "A" and "D" to rotate the Earth
  • use space bar to activate a vortex and pull the Moon back to the Earth faster
  • hit the UFO's with the Moon before they reach the Earth
  • collect power-ups to survive longer and destroy more UFO's
NEW FEATURES JULY 12 - 
  • separated from the Jam version with its own sparkly new itch page!
  • score displayed on game over screen!
  • previous score saved while in session, and displayed on the game over screen also
  • total UFO count on game over screen
  • revamped main menu with absolutely no functional features... yet
  • NEW POWERUP - Super Moon makes Moon Super for ten  seconds
  • prettier particles for both stars and the vortex effect
GOALS -
  • the current main goal is to develop MOONSLINGER for a summer mobile release!
  • create a fun and free experience
  • release regular updates
PLANNED AND UPCOMMING FEATURES -
  • sound settings
  • other stuff in the main menu
  • a new cover image
  • another power up
  • boss UFO
  • A PAUSE BUTTON
  • saved scores!
